name: Swig Sugar Cookies
steps: Cream together butter, vegetable oil, sugars, water and eggs.
Combine dry ingredients and slowly add to butter mixture.
Mix until everything is combined. Your dough should be a little crumbly and not sticky at all. Roll into a golf ball sized ball of dough and place it on your cookie sheet.
Firmly press into the center of your dough ball. You want your dough to spill out over the sides of the glass. If there is a lip its even better.
Bake at 350 for 8 minutes. They should just barely be browning on the bottom. Move cookies to a cooling rack. Once they are cool put them in the fridge.
